overall_strategy: Keep the early 3/4 feel elegant and phrase-led (breathe/pendulum/scan), then evolve choruses with contrasting textures beyond pulse/fan (holds, plane changes, circular asymmetry). Use short pre-hit cues at key transitions (notably bar 78→79) and make the strobe moment explicitly beat-1 accented for 3/4 legibility. End with a uniquely ‘final’ silhouette/plane hold (less motion, more picture).
